name: Magic: the Gathering - Learn to Play Guide
description:
Magic: the Gathering - Learn to Play Guide

This learn to play Magic: The Gathering Guide was used to teach some of my coworkers at Figma the basics of the game.


We have a strong community of players at Figma and regularly schedule games and events over lunch or after work.


Related resources

Looking to create your own cards in Figma? Check out my Magic Card Designer.
